title: Incident of Ragging in IIT Kharagpur
text: This page aims to document all cases of harassment and ragging in the institute since August 2019.
page: Incident of Ragging in IIT Kharagpur

title: Incident 1: 2019-08-04 - 2nd year student physically assaulted by a 3rd year student
text:
Note: Names have been changed to maintain anonymity.
On 4th August 2019 at around 6:30 A.M., 3rd and 4th year students were banging doors trying to find Harry (a 2nd year student) of XYZ hall. Harry, who was unwell at that time, took some time to open the door. This infuriated the seniors and they wanted to drag Harry to the sports trials, despite the fact that he was unwell.
Meanwhile, another third-year student named Tommy came rushing, repeatedly shouting at Harry at the top of his voice. In irritation, Harry uttered an abusive word. In retaliation, Tommy tightly slapped him twice. Then, he choked Harry against the wall and slapped him a few more times. This left scratches and bruises on the victim.
The investigation into this case is still in progress. There is a common perception that this is a fairly simple case of ragging with several witnesses and enough proof backing this version of events.
